extendedIngredients.name: green onion
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 tablespoons each chopped onion, celery and green pepper

extendedIngredients.name: ground sausage
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/4 pound Johnsonville® Mild Ground Italian Sausage

recipes.title: Best Spanish Rice
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a small saucepan, cook the sausage, onion, celery and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink and the vegetables are tender. Add garlic; cook 1 minute longer. Drain.                                                                                           Add the water, rice, Cajun seasoning, pepper sauce, salt, paprika and pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring once. Stir in tomatoes; heat through.                                        Yield: 3 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Spanish Rice in  Cooking for 2Spring 2009, p18                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             2/3 cup equals 158 calories, 5 g fat (2 g saturated fat), 15 mg cholesterol, 342 mg sodium, 22 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 6 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 1 starch, 1 vegetable, 1 fat.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a small saucepan, cook the sausage, onion, celery and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink and the vegetables are tender.

Add the water, rice, Cajun seasoning, pepper sauce, salt, paprika and pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring once. Stir in tomatoes; heat through.
